sqlMap.update: insert into myalbum (myalb_no, myalb_name, myalb_indate, mem_id) values ( seq_myalb_no.nextval, #name#, sysdate, #id#)
sqlMap.select:
select a.myalb_name, a.myalb_no, ( select count ( distinct b.mus_no )
from myalbum_list b where b.myalb_no = a.myalb_no ) as mus_count from myalbum a where mem_id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from myalbum where mem_id=#mem_id# and myalb_no=#myalb_no#
sqlMap.update: update myalbum set myalb_name=#myalb_name# where mem_id=#mem_id# and myalb_no=#myalb_no#
